::::MakeCmdLegal

proc  ::::MakeCmdLegal { cmd {fd_res NULL} {testNo CheckCmdLegal} }
################################################################# Procedure Name: MakeCmdLegal Description: Send the command again until the switch accept it. It will try it three times and stop Input args: cmd {fd_res NULL} {testNo "CheckCmdLegal"} Output args: none Typical usage: Category Types (SetupSwitch,GetSwitchInfo,SendTraffic,CaptureTraffic, SetupTestTool,VerifySwitchOutput,Utility,VerifyTraffic) Category: VerifySwitchOutput #################################################################
